alignments_reset_wa_tool:
Changes have been detected in your project which have invalidated some of your alignments.
These verses display an icon of a broken chain next to the reference in the side menu.
invalid_verse_alignments_and_selections: Changes have been detected in your project which have invalidated some selections and some alignments. These verses display an icon of a broken chain next to the reference in the side menu.
invalidation_checking: Checking if this edit conflicts with saved selections and alignments...
quote_invalid: Praman kuribole thik nohua ashol bhasa laga khisa: '${quote}'
nothing_to_select_description: Jetiya chuni lobo, chuni lowa khanke sampurna huwa mani lobo. Jetiya bhasa bodli kura tu thik ashe tetiya he itu chunibi kintu ene chunibole naparibo.
selections_invalidated: Kunuba chunibole lagiya khantu etiya thik nohua hoise itu karne utukhan ke hatai diya hoise.
empty_verse:
No selection can be made because the verse is blank.
You may fix this by editing the verse.
If desired, you may also leave a comment or bookmark this check.
no_selection:
No selection has been made.
Click the Select button, then select the translation for this check.
no_selection_needed_description:
Ekubi chuniya huwa nai.
Itu chuniya tu enika ashe:
selection_invalidated: The selection for this check was invalidated.
invalidated_tooltip: A selection is invalidated if the words selected were then edited.
first_make_change: First, make changes to verse above
select_translation: Please ${span} select ${span} the correct translation for your current check.
can_skip: If you are unable to perform this check, you may ${span} skip it ${span} and come back to it later.

icons.selections_found: Selections were found for this check
icons.no_selections_found: No selections were found for this check
icons.verse_edits_found: Verse edits were found for this check
icons.no_verse_edits_found: No Verse edits were found for this check
icons.comments_found: Comments were found for this check
icons.no_comments_found: No comments were found for this check
icons.bookmarked: This check has been bookmarked for review
icons.not_bookmarked: This check has not been bookmarked for review

select_too_many: Nautun halibole karne agete chuniya tu click kuribi. Arubi ${maximum} pora bishi kotha khan chunibole karne, nijor bekti kotha khan nohoikena ashol kotha khan he.

pane.missing_verse_warning: [WARNING: This Bible version does not include text for this reference.]
pane.title: Step 1. Read
pane.expand_hover: Click to show expanded resource panes

exhortation: Udogai dia nohole ba uncha sahos kuri diya
participle_active: Hodai bebohar kurya jug kotha khan
participle_passive: Hodai bebohar kurya jug kotha khan jenekoi, dwara
infinitive_absolute: Apurna uttam, gramar hisapte, jeneke; jaboi lage nohole ba koriboi lage
qal: Qal toh Hebrew bhasa laga verb ashe jun laga dwara sankhya gonti koribo pare jeneke, ek-jon nohole dui-jon
hophal: Bisesh karon, jun karon pora kiba hobole diye
hithpael: Hebrew grammar te nijor ke kiba koribole thakia  laga kotha koa jeneke, 'ami nijor ke' murabole ase, itu Hithpael koi
